item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, My name is Jun-Liszt Li. Currently, I am a postdoc researcher in David M. Sabatini lab. Before that, I was a graduate student in PKU-CIBR joint program of Peking University. My long-term goal is to discover and characterize basic mechanisms underlying brain aging and neuron growth. In addition, I worked on next-generation gene therapy tools (AAV, promoter) in order to apply these technologies to explore animal physiology and address specific problems.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Currently, I live in Prague, Czech Republic. You can contact me through email or interact with me in twitter/X(@poppingjun) since I frequently check it. Email Gmail: poppingjun7@gmail.com Outlook: poppingjun@outlook.com
